links.*: The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition

wikitext.*:
''[[The Hobbit]]'' has been translated into many languages. Known languages, with the first date of publishing, are:
* '''[[Wikipedia:Afrikaans language|Afrikaans]]''': ''Die Hobbit' (2017)http://www.proteaboekhuis.com/site.php/die-hobbit.htmlhttp://www.roekeloos.co.za/boeke/die-hobbit * '''[[Wikipedia:Armenian language|Armenian]]''': ''Hobit: Kam Gnaln ou Galû'' (1984){{HM|AH}}, pp. 387-96 * '''[[Wikipedia:Breton language|Breton]]''': ''An Hobbit, pe eno ha distro'' (2001) * '''[[Wikipedia:Belarusian language|Belarusian]]''': Хобiт, або Вандроўка туды i назад (2002){{webcite|author=Marek Śliwiński|articleurl=http://www.tolkien.com.pl/hobbit/collection/hobbit-belarusian-2002-1st.php|articlename=Hobbit - Belarusian language|website=[http://www.tolkien.com.pl/hobbit/ Babel Hobbits]|accessed=26 August 2012}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Bengali language|Bengali]]''': হবিট (2011, by Santi Chatterjee){{webcite|author=Suravi Chatterjee-Woolman|articleurl=http://tolkienlibrary.com/press/1070-Tolkien-in-Bengali.php|articlename=Tolkien translations: Tolkien in Bengali|dated=5 January 2013|website=TL|accessed=25 February 2013}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Bulgarian language|Bulgarian]]''': ''Bilbo Begins, ili, Dotam i obratno'' (1975); ''Khobit: Bilbo Begins, ili, Dotam i obratno'' (1999) * '''[[Wikipedia:Catalan language|Catalan]]''': ''El Hòbbit, o, Viatge d'anada i tornada'' (1983) * '''[[Wikipedia:Chinese language|Chinese]]''': ''小矮人闯龙穴'' (1996); ''哈比人歷險記'' (2001); ''霍比特人'' (2002) * '''[[Wikipedia:Cornish language|Cornish]]''': ''An Hobys, pò An Fordh Dy ha Tre Arta'' (2014){{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.evertype.com/books/hobys.html|articlename=An Hobys, pò An Fordh Dy ha Tre Arta. ''The Hobbit, or There and Back Again'' in Cornish|dated=|website=[http://www.evertype.com evertype.com]|accessed=20 April 2015}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Croatian language|Croatian]]''': ''Hobit'' (1994) * '''[[Wikipedia:Czech language|Czech]]''': ''Hobit, aneb, Cesta tam a zase zpátky'' (1979) * '''[[Wikipedia:Danish language|Danish]]''': ''Hobbitten, eller, Ud og hjem igen'' (1969) * '''[[Wikipedia:Dutch language|Dutch]]''': ''De hobbit, of Daarheen en weer terug'' (1960, by [[Max Schuchart]]); ''De hobbit, of Daarheen en weer terug'' (1976; revised transl.) * '''[[Wikipedia:Esperanto|Esperanto]]''': ''[[La hobito]]'' (2000) * '''[[Wikipedia:Estonian language|Estonian]]''': ''Kääbik, ehk, Sinna ja tagasi'' (1977) * '''[[Wikipedia:Faroese language|Faroese]]''': ''Hobbin, ella, Út og heim aftur'' (1990) * '''[[Wikipedia:Finnish language|Finnish]]''': ''Lohikäärmevuori, eli, Erään hoppelin matka sinne ja takaisin'' (1973); ''Hobitti, eli, Sinne ja takaisin'' (1985) * '''[[Wikipedia:French language|French]]''': ''Bilbo le Hobbit, ou, Histoire d'un aller et retour'' (1969); ''Le Hobbit'' (2012, by Daniel Lauzon){{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://forum.tolkiendil.com/thread-6627.html|articlename=Le Hobbit - nouvelle traduction de Daniel Lauzon|dated=|website=[http://forum.tolkiendil.com Tolkiendil.com]|accessed=31 December 2012}} * '''[[Wikipedia:West Frisian language|Frisian]]''': ''De Hobbit'' (2009) * '''[[Wikipedia:Galician language|Galician]]''': ''O Hobbit'' (2000) * '''[[Wikipedia:German language|German]]''': ''Kleiner Hobbit und der grosse Zauberer'' (1957, by [[Walter Scherf]]); rev. transl. in 1971 and 1991); ''Der Hobbit, oder, Hin und zurück'' (1997, by [[Wolfgang Krege]]) * '''[[Wikipedia:Greek language|Greek]]''': ''Χόμπιτ'' (1978) * '''[[Wikipedia:Hebrew language|Hebrew]]''': ''ha-Hobit, o, Le-sham uva-hazarah'' (1976); ''[[Hobit (1977 Hebrew edition)|Hobit]]'' (1977); ''ha-Hobit'' (2012){{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.elrondslibrary.fr/T_Hebreu_GB.html|articlename=Hebrew|dated=|website=[http://www.elrondslibrary.fr/ Elrond's Library]|accessed=24 September 2013}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Hungarian language|Hungarian]]''': ''A babó'' (1975) * '''[[Wikipedia:Icelandic language|Icelandic]]''': ''Hobbit'' (1978); ''Hobbitinn, eða, Út og Heim Aftur'' (1997) * '''[[Wikipedia:Irish language|Ireland]]''': ''An Hobad'' (2012){{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.theonering.net/torwp/2012/05/10/56098-some-thoughts-on-the-irish-language-hobbit/|articlename=Some thoughts on the Irish language Hobbit…|dated=10 May 2012|website=TORN|accessed=20 May 2013}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Indonesian language|Indonesian]]''': ''Hobbit'' (1977) * '''[[Wikipedia:Italian language|Italian]]''': ''Lo Hobbit, o, La riconquista del tesoro'' (1973) * '''[[Wikipedia:Japanese language|Japanese]]''': ''Hobitto no Bôken'' (1965; rev. transl. in 1983); ''Hobitto, Yukite kaerishi Monogatari'' (1997) * '''[[Wikipedia:Korean language|Korean]]''': [''호빗''] (1997) * '''[[Wikipedia:Latin|Latin]]''': ''Hobbitus Ille'' (2012){{webcite|author=Benedicte Page|articleurl=http://www.thebookseller.com/news/latin-hobbit-harper.html|articlename=Latin Hobbit for Harper|dated=8 May 2012|website=[http://www.thebookseller.com/ TheBookSeller.com]|accessed=26 August 2012}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Latvian language|Latvian]]''': ''Hobits, jeb, Turp un atpakal'' (1991) * '''[[Wikipedia:Lithuanian language|Lithuanian]]''': ''Hobitas, arba, Ten ir atgal: Apysaka-pasaka'' (1985) * '''[[Wikipedia:Luxembourgish language|Luxembourgish]]''': ''Den Hobbit'' (2002) * '''[[Wikipedia:Marathi language|Marathi]]''': [''The Hobbit''] (2011){{webcite|author=[[Pieter Collier]]|articleurl=http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/1011-Interview-marathi-hobbit-publisher-translator.php|articlename=Interview with Nilesh Pashte and Meena Kinikar about The Hobbit in Marathi|dated=25 September 2011|website=TL|accessed=26 August 2012}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Moldavian language|Moldavian]]''': ''Hobbitul'' (1987) * '''[[Wikipedia:Norwegian language|Norwegian]]''': ''Hobbiten, eller, Fram og tilbake igjen'' (1972); ''Hobbiten, eller, Fram og tilbake igjen'' (1997, by [[Nils Ivar Agøy]]) * '''[[Wikipedia:Persian language|Persian]]''': هابيت يا آنجا و بازگشت دوباره
(2004){{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/wiwimod/index.php?page=Persian+Hobbit+2004|articlename=Persian Hobbit 2004|dated=|website=Guide|accessed=26 August 2012}} (in total, 5 different transl.?){{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.ibna.ir/vdcauino.49nuw1gtk4.html|articlename=Iran to celebrate J.R.R. Tolkien’s birthday|dated=4 January 2011|website=[http://www.ibna.ir/en/ Iran Book News Agency]|accessed=26 August 2012}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Polish language|Polish]]''': ''Hobbit, czyli tam i z powrotem'' (1960; rev. transl. 1985); ''Hobbit, albo tam i z powrotem'' (1997); [''The Hobbit''] (2002){{fact}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Portuguese language|Portuguese]]''': ''[[O Gnomo]]'' (1962); ''O Hobbit'' (1976); ''O Hobbit'' (1985); ''[[O Hobbit (Brazilian edition)|O Hobbit]]'' (1995) * '''[[Wikipedia:Romanian language|Romanian]]''': [[O poveste cu un hobbit (1975)|''O poveste cu un hobbit'']] (1975); ''Povestea Unui Hobbit'' (1995) * '''[[Wikipedia:Russian language|Russian]]''': (1976; 9 different translations total)[[Mark T. Hooker]], ''[[Tolkien Through Russian Eyes]]'' * '''[[Wikipedia:Scottish Gaelic|Scottish Gaelic]]''': ''A' Hobat, no A-null ’s Air Ais A-rithist'' (2025)[https://www.evertype.com/books/hobbit-gd.html A' Hobat, no A-null ’s Air Ais A-rithist : The Hobbit, or There and Back Again in Scottish Gaelic]], [http://www.evertype.com evertype.com]. * '''[[Wikipedia:Serbian language|Serbian]]''': ''Hobit'' (1975) * '''[[Wikipedia:Slovak language|Slovak]]''': ''Hobbiti'' (1973) * '''[[Wikipedia:Spanish language|Spanish]]''': ''[[El hobito]]'' (1964); ''El hobbit'' (1982) * '''[[Wikipedia:Swedish language|Swedish]]''': ''[[Hompen]]'' (1947); ''Bilbo: en hobbits äventyr'' (1962, by [[Britt G. Hallqvist]]); ''Hobbiten'' (2007, by [[Erik Andersson]]){{fact}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Thai language|Thai]]''': [''The Hobbit''] (2002) * '''[[Wikipedia:Turkish language|Turkish]]''': ''Hobbit, Oradaydık ve şimdi buradayız'' (1996); ''Hobbit, Oradaydık ve şimdi buradayız'' (1997) * '''[[Wikipedia:Ukrainian language|Ukrainian]]''': ''Hobit, abo, Mandrivka za imlysti hory'' (1985) * '''[[Wikipedia:Welsh language|Welsh]]''': ''Yr Hobyd'' (2024){{webcite|articleurl=https://nation.cymru/culture/yr-hobyd-tolkiens-the-hobbit-to-be-published-in-welsh/|website=Nation.Cymru|accessed=3 May 2024}} * '''[[Wikipedia:Yiddish language|Yiddish]]''': ''der hobit: oder ahin un vider tsurik '' (2012){{webcite|author=[[John D. Rateliff]]|articleurl=http://groups.yahoo.com/group/mythsoc/message/24584|articlename=The Yiddish HOBBIT|dated=22 August 2013|website=Mythsoc|accessed=22 August 2013}}
